name: Axonius
description: Axonius cybersecurity asset management solutions offer a comprehensive IT asset inventory, empowering users to enforce their network security policies.

dataTypes.name: Hostname
dataTypes.description: Matches on possible Hostnames lookups which can be a single search term between 5 and 25 characters using A-Z, 0-9 and dashes.

options.name: Axonius URL
options.description: The base URL for your Axonius instance including the schema (i.e., https://myaxonius)

options.name: Search Result Limit
options.description: Maximum number of query results to return in the Polarity overlay.

options.name: Asset Search by IP Query
options.description: The query to run when searching assets/devices by IP address. The string `{{ENTITY}}` will be replaced by the looked up IP address.

options.name: Asset Search by Host Query
options.description: The query to run when searching assets/devices by hostname. The string `{{ENTITY}}` will be replaced by the looked up hostname.

options.name: User Search by Email Query
options.description: The query to run when searching users by email address. The string `{{ENTITY}}` will be replaced by the looked up email address.

options.name: Display Data as Table
options.description: If checked, the integration will display all data as a table.  This setting is for troubleshooting.
